src

Class ItemProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.ItemProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.wikidata.wdtk.datamodel.interfaces.EntityDocumentProcessor

    public class ItemProcessor
extends Object
implements org.wikidata.wdtk.datamodel.interfaces.EntityDocumentProcessor
    Implementation of a EntityDocumentProcessor Reads, filters and converts a Wikidata dump and calls methods to create SQL-Statements to save its items and properties persistently
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Marco Kinkel, Markus Kroetzsch

      Counts the found jobs in all items

      Counts the found persons in all items

    • Method Detail

      • processItemDocument

        public void processItemDocument(org.wikidata.wdtk.datamodel.interfaces.ItemDocument itemDocument)
        Processes entities (not properties!) from wikidata dump. Filters them by their properties and writes them into the static lists of this class. Called by Helper.processEntitiesFromWikidataDump(EntityDocumentProcessor).
        Specified by:
        processItemDocument in interface org.wikidata.wdtk.datamodel.interfaces.EntityDocumentProcessor
        Parameters:
        itemDocument - Current entity to be read, filtered and stored

      • processPropertyDocument

        public void processPropertyDocument(org.wikidata.wdtk.datamodel.interfaces.PropertyDocument propertyDocument)
        Processes items from wikidata dump. Filters them by their properties and writes them into the static lists of this class. Called indirecly in Helper.processEntitiesFromWikidataDump(EntityDocumentProcessor).
        Specified by:
        processPropertyDocument in interface org.wikidata.wdtk.datamodel.interfaces.EntityDocumentProcessor
        Parameters:
        propertyDocument - Current property to be read and stored
